text: Loppi () is a municipality in Kanta-Häme, Finland. As of 31 December 2020, the municipality had a population of 7,855. The municipalities next to it are Hyvinkää, Hämeenlinna, Janakkala, Karkkila, Riihimäki, Tammela and Vihti. Loppi was founded in 1632. == Other websites == * Official website of the municipality of Loppi Category:17th-century establishments in Finland Category:1630s establishments in Europe Category:1632 establishments Category:Municipalities of Kanta-Häme
title: Loppi
